appId.description: Unique ID for an Amplify app.

certificateVerificationDnsRecord.description: The DNS record for certificate verification.

domainName.description: Domain name for the domain association.

enableAutoSubDomain.description: Enables the automated creation of subdomains for branches.

subDomains.description: Setting for the subdomain. Documented below.

waitForVerification.description: If enabled, the resource will wait for the domain association status to change to `PENDING_DEPLOYMENT` or `AVAILABLE`. Setting this to `false` will skip the process. Default: `true`.
